privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.subtitle: Information about how we collect, use and protect your personal information

intro.title: Introduction
intro.content: At BEMYTECH we value your privacy and are committed to protecting your personal information. This policy describes how we collect, use and protect the information you provide to us.

dataCollection.title: Information Collection
dataCollection.content: We collect information that you provide to us directly, such as your name, email address and messages when you contact us through our contact forms.

dataUse.title: Use of Information
dataUse.content: We use your information to respond to your inquiries, provide you with our services and improve our products and services.

dataSharing.title: Information Sharing
dataSharing.content: We do not sell, rent or share your personal information with third parties without your explicit consent, except when required by law.

dataSecurity.title: Data Security
dataSecurity.content: We implement technical and organizational security measures to protect your personal information against unauthorized access, alteration, disclosure or destruction.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.content: You have the right to access, rectify, update or request deletion of your personal information. To exercise these rights, contact us.

contact.title: Contact
contact.content: If you have questions about this privacy policy, you can contact us through our communication channels.
